entries.journal_entry_description: Kerssoc wants you to collect 17 flawless Kashyyyk bantha pelts from Kashyyyk banthas in the area.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Kerssoc wants you to collect 17 flawless Kashyyyk bantha pelts from Kashyyyk banthas in the area.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Speak with Kerssoc now that you have collected the flawless Kashyyyk bantha pelts he wanted.
